fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Hygiene, biocides, labelling of foodstuffs, provision of information to consumers, nutrition
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: ECFF works to promote the safety and quality of chilled prepared foods in the EU's EUR 25bn market. ECFF represents the industry and its views to European decision makers and regulatory bodies, coordinates the activities of national chilled food organisations, liaises with other industry associations, regulatory authorities, research organisations, retailer and consumer groups
relevant_communication:
ECFF Recommendations for the Production of Pre-packaged Chilled Foods 
 
ECFF Botulinum WG Report
